mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_MID( RAW_MACHINE_ID, UNLOAD_POS, REMARK, CHECK_TIME, OPERATOR, CHECK_STATE ) VALUES ( #{rawMachineId}, #{acceptPos}, #{remark}, #{checkTime}, #{operator}, 0 )
INSERT INTO TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_DE_MI( RAW_MACHINE_ID, DATA_NO, DATA_NAME, AMOUNT ) VALUES ( #{rawMachineId}, #{dataNo}, #{dataName}, #{dataValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT IC.RAW_MACHINE_ID, IC.UNLOAD_POS, IC.REMARK, IC.CHECK_TIME, IC.OPERATOR FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_MID IC WHERE IC.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId}
SELECT ICD.RAW_MACHINE_ID, ICD.DATA_NO, ICD.DATA_NAME, ICD.AMOUNT FROM TB_LOGISTICS_INPUT_CHECK_DE_MI ICD WHERE ICD.RAW_MACHINE_ID = #{rawMachineId} ORDER BY ICD.DATA_NO
